content: **knitted hat for children in drops sky the piece is worked with rib sizes 2 to 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no skip-020-bn yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years fits head-size 48/50 50/52 52/54 54/56 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50-50 g colour 11 hazelnut needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
